subject: Re: Mortgage Glossary.
body:
Hello,

Our staff have been trying to contact you without any success regards refinancing your current property,

We have pre_Approved your Refinance Application. In order to connect you with the BEST lender for your situation, we need your info to be verified.

Your File #: V51 - 33510

Please visit the link below to complete your verification, so we can start paperwork.
http://refinance_67.blockdkfrme.com

Thank You,
Eduardo Mohr
